name: Multi-system: Full Stocks Attributes of S&P500 Information Technology Index
title: Multi-system: 82 Stocks in S&P 500 Information Technology Index Constituent Financial Attributes
description: Financial and market data for the 82 companies in the S&P 500 Information Technology index. Each CSV file is named by its ticker symbol and follows this schema with 107 attributes.

fields.name: Date
fields.description: Trading date or period end in YYYY-MM-DD format

fields.name: Revenue
fields.description: Total sales or revenue for the period

fields.name: Revenue Growth
fields.description: Period-over-period percentage change in revenue

fields.name: Cost of Revenue
fields.description: Direct costs of goods sold or services delivered

fields.name: Gross Profit
fields.description: Revenue minus Cost of Revenue

fields.name: Selling, General & Admin
fields.description: Operating expenses for sales, marketing, and corporate overhead

fields.name: Research & Development
fields.description: Expenses on R&D activities for new products or services

fields.name: Operating Expenses
fields.description: All non-COGS operating costs, including SG&A and R&D

fields.name: Other Operating Expenses
fields.description: Non-recurring operating expenses outside the usual run rate

fields.name: Operating Income
fields.description: Gross Profit minus total Operating Expenses

fields.name: Interest Expense / Income
fields.description: Net interest paid or earned

fields.name: Other Expense / Income
fields.description: Non-operating gains or losses

fields.name: Pretax Income
fields.description: Operating Income plus/minus non-operating items, before tax

fields.name: Income Tax
fields.description: Tax expense recorded for the period

fields.name: Net Income
fields.description: Pretax Income minus Income Tax

fields.name: Preferred Dividends
fields.description: Dividends paid to preferred shareholders

fields.name: Net Income Common
fields.description: Net Income available to common shareholders

fields.name: Net Income Growth
fields.description: Period-over-period percentage change in Net Income

fields.name: Shares Outstanding (Basic)
fields.description: Weighted average basic shares outstanding

fields.name: Net Income
fields.description: The final profit obtained by the company after deducting all expenses

fields.name: Shares Outstanding (Diluted)
fields.description: Weighted average fully diluted shares outstanding

fields.name: Shares Change
fields.description: Percentage change in shares outstanding

fields.name: EPS (Basic)
fields.description: Net Income Common divided by basic shares

fields.name: EPS (Diluted)
fields.description: Net Income Common divided by diluted shares

fields.name: EPS Growth
fields.description: Period-over-period percentage change in EPS

fields.name: Free Cash Flow Per Share
fields.description: Free Cash Flow divided by basic shares outstanding

fields.name: Dividend Per Share
fields.description: Total dividends paid divided by basic shares outstanding

fields.name: Dividend Growth
fields.description: Period-over-period percentage change in dividends per share

fields.name: Gross Margin
fields.description: Gross Profit as a percentage of Revenue

fields.name: Operating Margin
fields.description: Operating Income as a percentage of Revenue

fields.name: Profit Margin
fields.description: Net Income as a percentage of Revenue

fields.name: Free Cash Flow Margin
fields.description: Free Cash Flow as a percentage of Revenue

fields.name: Effective Tax Rate
fields.description: Income Tax divided by Pretax Income

fields.name: EBITDA
fields.description: Earnings before interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization

fields.name: EBITDA Margin
fields.description: EBITDA as a percentage of Revenue

fields.name: Depreciation & Amortization
fields.description: Non-cash charges for asset depreciation and intangible amortization

fields.name: EBIT
fields.description: Earnings before interest and tax (Operating Income)

fields.name: EBIT Margin
fields.description: EBIT as a percentage of Revenue

fields.name: Cash & Equivalents
fields.description: Cash on hand and short-term liquid investments

fields.name: Short-Term Investments
fields.description: Marketable securities convertible within one year

fields.name: Cash & Cash Equivalents
fields.description: Total of Cash & Equivalents and Short-Term Investments

fields.name: Cash Growth
fields.description: Period-over-period change in Cash & Equivalents

fields.name: Receivables
fields.description: Accounts receivable from customers

fields.name: Inventory
fields.description: Raw materials, work-in-process, and finished goods

fields.name: Other Current Assets
fields.description: Current assets not separately classified

fields.name: Total Current Assets
fields.description: Sum of all current assets

fields.name: Property, Plant & Equipment
fields.description: Net book value of tangible fixed assets

fields.name: Long-Term Investments
fields.description: Investments held beyond one year

fields.name: Goodwill and Intangibles
fields.description: Purchased intangible assets and goodwill

fields.name: Other Long-Term Assets
fields.description: Non-current assets not elsewhere classified

fields.name: Total Long-Term Assets
fields.description: Sum of all non-current assets

fields.name: Total Assets
fields.description: Total Current Assets plus Total Long-Term Assets

fields.name: Accounts Payable
fields.description: Amounts owed to suppliers

fields.name: Deferred Revenue
fields.description: Payments received in advance of delivery

fields.name: Current Debt
fields.description: Short-term borrowings due within one year

fields.name: Total Current Liabilities
fields.description: Sum of liabilities due within one year

fields.name: Other Current Liabilities
fields.description: Current obligations not elsewhere classified

fields.name: Long-Term Debt
fields.description: Borrowings due after one year

fields.name: Total Long-Term Liabilities
fields.description: Sum of liabilities due after one year

fields.name: Other Long-Term Liabilities
fields.description: Non-debt long-term obligations

fields.name: Total Liabilities
fields.description: Total Current Liabilities plus Total Long-Term Liabilities

fields.name: Total Debt
fields.description: Current Debt plus Long-Term Debt

fields.name: Debt Growth
fields.description: Period-over-period percentage change in Total Debt

fields.name: Retained Earnings
fields.description: Accumulated net income minus dividends

fields.name: Comprehensive Income
fields.description: Net Income adjusted for other comprehensive items

fields.name: Shareholders Equity
fields.description: Total Assets minus Total Liabilities

fields.name: Net Cash / Debt
fields.description: Cash & Equivalents minus Total Debt

fields.name: Net Cash / Debt Growth
fields.description: Period-over-period change in Net Cash / Debt

fields.name: Net Cash Per Share
fields.description: Net Cash / Debt divided by basic shares outstanding

fields.name: Working Capital
fields.description: Total Current Assets minus Total Current Liabilities

fields.name: Book Value Per Share
fields.description: Shareholders’ Equity divided by basic shares outstanding

fields.name: Share-Based Compensation
fields.description: Non-cash expense related to equity awards

fields.name: Other Operating Activities
fields.description: Cash impacts from non-standard operating items

fields.name: Operating Cash Flow
fields.description: Cash generated from core business operations

fields.name: Operating Cash Flow Growth
fields.description: Period-over-period change in Operating Cash Flow

fields.name: Capital Expenditures
fields.description: Cash spent on acquiring or maintaining fixed assets

fields.name: Acquisitions
fields.description: Cash used for business acquisitions

fields.name: Change in Investments
fields.description: Net cash flow from investment purchases or sales

fields.name: Other Investing Activities
fields.description: Cash flows from other investing activities

fields.name: Investing Cash Flow
fields.description: Net cash from investing activities

fields.name: Dividends Paid
fields.description: Cash distributed to shareholders as dividends

fields.name: Share Issuance / Repurchase
fields.description: Cash flows from issuing or repurchasing equity

fields.name: Debt Issued / Paid
fields.description: Cash flows from borrowing or repaying debt

fields.name: Other Financing Activities
fields.description: Cash flows from other financing activities

fields.name: Financing Cash Flow
fields.description: Net cash from financing activities

fields.name: Net Cash Flow
fields.description: Sum of Operating, Investing, and Financing Cash Flows

fields.name: Free Cash Flow
fields.description: Operating Cash Flow minus Capital Expenditures

fields.name: Free Cash Flow Growth
fields.description: Period-over-period change in Free Cash Flow

fields.name: Market Capitalization
fields.description: Share price multiplied by shares outstanding

fields.name: Market Cap Growth
fields.description: Period-over-period change in Market Capitalization

fields.name: Enterprise Value
fields.description: Market Cap plus debt minus cash

fields.name: PE Ratio
fields.description: Share price divided by diluted EPS

fields.name: PS Ratio
fields.description: Market Cap divided by Revenue

fields.name: PB Ratio
fields.description: Market Cap divided by Book Value of Equity

fields.name: P/FCF Ratio
fields.description: Market Cap divided by Free Cash Flow

fields.name: P/OCF Ratio
fields.description: Market Cap divided by Operating Cash Flow

fields.name: Debt/Equity
fields.description: Total Debt divided by Shareholders’ Equity

fields.name: Quick Ratio
fields.description: (Cash & Cash Equivalents + Receivables) ÷ Current Liabilities

fields.name: Current Ratio
fields.description: Current Assets ÷ Current Liabilities

fields.name: Return on Invested Capital (ROIC)
fields.description: NOPAT divided by total invested capital

fields.name: Dividend Yield
fields.description: Dividend Per Share divided by share price

fields.name: Payout Ratio
fields.description: Dividends Per Share ÷ Diluted EPS

fields.name: Buyback Yield
fields.description: Share repurchases ÷ Market Capitalization

fields.name: Total Return
fields.description: Price appreciation plus dividend yield for the period
